Title: Chicken tikka masala
Subtitle: A spicy and absorbing classic
Desc: Grilled and marinated chicken breast in masala sauce atop pilau rice
P1: Deliciously spicy and rich grilled chicken that has marinaded in masala sauce for at least 24 hours.
P2: The chicken is served on a bed of nutritious and fluffy pilau rice and is covered in rich, spicy masala sauce.
Major_note: Lots of allergens, see alergens section
